name: Truth (TheReapersBro)
description:
Truth is a 2D platformer originally made for the Brackey's Game Jam in 2022

4 Developers

Justin Ferreira - Level Design, Art/Asset production

Brandon Cole - Software Engineering in Unity Scripts, UI

William Jeon - Graphic Design, Art/Asset production

Paul Pruden - Sound effects

Controls-

AD or Left and Right Arrow Keys to move Left and right across the screen

W or Up arrow key to Jump 

Space bar to Shoot rocks at enemies

X to see the truth

press esc to pause
